casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard Lionel COOK. No. 341A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 17, 2007. Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Counsel, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of December 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Cook) shall have up to and including the 31st day of January 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of December 2007."
